en.build_commands_desc:
`/postbuilds` - Post build selection menu
        `/mybuild` - View your current build
        `/resetbuild` - Reset and change your build
        `/createroles` - Create all build and weapon roles (Admin)
en.war_commands_desc:
`/warpoll` - Post war participation poll (Admin)
        `/warlist [day]` - Show who's playing (optional: saturday/sunday)
        `/setwar <setting> <value>` - Configure war settings (Admin)
        `/warconfig` - View current war configuration
        `/testreminder <day>` - Test war reminder (Admin)
        `/resetwar <confirm>` - Reset current week's war data (Admin)
        `/resetallwar <confirm>` - Reset ALL war data (Admin)
        `/setlanguage <language>` - Set server language (Admin)
en.profile_commands_desc:
`/setupprofile` - Guided profile setup (recommended)
        `/setprofile` - Quick profile update
        `/profile [user]` - View player profile
        `/updatestats` - Update your mastery points or level
        `/leaderboard [type] [limit]` - View server leaderboard
        `/changename` - Change your in-game name
        `/mylanguage [en|ar]` - Set your language (English/Arabic)
        `/deleteprofile [user]` - Delete a player's profile (Admin)
en.system_commands_desc:
`/synccommands` - Force sync slash commands (Admin)
        `/help` - Show this help message
en.war_poll_desc: Vote for which war(s) you'll participate in this weekend!
en.use_warlist: Use /warlist to see detailed player lists with their builds
en.times_local: Times shown in your local timezone
en.registered_both: âœ… You're registered for **both Saturday and Sunday wars**!
en.registered_not_playing: âœ… You're marked as **not playing** this weekend.
en.footer_builds: Times shown in your local timezone â€¢ Players without builds should use /setupprofile
en.reset_build: Are you sure you want to reset your build?
en.no_profile: No profile found. Use `/setupprofile` to create one!
en.dm_only: This command can only be used in a server.
en.postbuilds_desc: Click the button below to set up your complete profile!
en.postbuilds_footer: Complete your profile in one easy form!
en.err_level_range: âŒ Level must be between 1 and 100!
en.err_mastery_positive: âŒ Mastery points must be positive!
en.err_valid_numbers: âŒ Please enter valid numbers for level and mastery!
en.err_war_channel_not_set: âŒ War channel not configured! Use `/setwar setting:war_channel value:#channel`
en.err_war_channel_not_found: âŒ Configured war channel not found!
en.no_players_leaderboard: âŒ No players have profiles yet!
en.now_select_weapons: Now select your weapons (you can select 1-2 weapons):

en.mylanguage_desc: Set or view your preferred language (English/Arabic)
en.join_invalid_numbers: âŒ Please enter valid numbers for level and power!
en.join_not_setup: âŒ Join request system is not set up yet. Please contact an admin.
en.join_rejected_power: âŒ Unfortunately, you don't meet our minimum power requirement of **{min_power:,}**. Please come back when you're stronger!
